transcript:
and with a look of inquiry. The son noticed that an expression of profound sorrow suddenly clouded his mother's face, and he smiled slightly. 
"Ah, Prince! In what sad circumstances we meet again! And how is our dear invalid?" said she, as though unaware of the cold of- fensive look fixed on her. 
Prince Vasili stared at her and at Boris ques- tioningly and perplexed. Boris bowed polite- ly. Prince Vasili without acknowledging the bow turned to Anna Mikhdylovna, answering her query by a
